naslov: STRMEC 448m2, Hoto vile (luksuzna 6sobna samostojeća kuća + garaža) (iznajmljivanje)
opis: Video uradak kuće pogledajte pod rubrikom VIDEO ili na yotube linku:  https://youtu.be/0oHG_DrbD0w Iznajmljuje se luksuzna šesterosobna samostojeća kuća površine 448 m2 koja se prostora na ukupno četiri etaže u Strmcu - Hoto Vile. Podzemna etaža: - garaža za četiri automobila; - hobi soba s kuhinjom; - vešeraj s toaletom; Prizemlje: - veliki dnevni boravka povezan i prostorom za blagovanje u open space prostor; - kuhinja; - toalet s predsobljem; - loggia; - velika terasa. Prvi kat: - hodnik; - dvije spavaće sobe: - velika spavaća soba s garderobnom sobom i kupaonicom; - kupaonica s toaletom. Drugi kat: - drugi dnevni boravak s kuhinjom; - spavaća soba; - kupaonica s toaletom; - terasa. Kući pridaju dva dodatna vanjska parkirna mjesta, te prekrasan privatni vrt u stražnjem dijelu parcele s grill roštiljem. Odlična i mirna lokacija; blizina busa; blizina svih potrebnih sadržaja. Režije po stvarnoj potrošnji (plinsko etažno grijanje). Polog u visini jedne mjesečne najamnine *Agencijska provizija u visini jedne mjesečne najamnine + PDV Kontakt: +385 95 202 0005 E-mail:  info@publicrealestate.hr WEB:  www.publicrealestate.hr __________________________________________________________________________ ENGLISH: Watch the video of the house under the VIDEO section or on the YouTube link: https://youtu.be/0oHG_DrbD0w For rent, a luxurious 4-bedroom villa with an area of 448 m2 on a total of four floors in Strmac - Hoto Villas. Underground floor: - garage for four cars; - hobby room with kitchen; - laundry room with toilet; Ground floor: - a large living room connected to an open space with a dining area; - the kitchen; - toilet with anteroom; - loggia; - big terrace. First floor: - corridor; - two bedrooms: - large bedroom with dressing room and bathroom; - bathroom with toilet. Second floor: - second living room with kitchen; - bedroom; - bathroom with toilet; - terrace. The house has two additional outdoor parking spaces and a beautiful private garden in the back of the plot with a grill. Excellent and quiet location; proximity to buses; proximity to all necessary facilities. Overhead according to actual consumption (gas central heating).
